data.meanings: to taste/experience/try/perceive. One who tastes, cause to taste.
data.sentence: The word فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ comes from the root ذ و ق and is associated with the meanings: to taste/experience/try/perceive. One who tastes, cause to taste.

data.meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
data.sentence: The word حَمِيمٌ comes from the root ح م م and is associated with the meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.

data.meanings: darkness, the night; shed tears, poured water; intense coldness; watery/thick purulent matter that flows or drips; intensely red (applied to she-camel)
data.sentence: The word وَغَسَّاقٌ comes from the root غ س ق and is associated with the meanings: darkness, the night; shed tears, poured water; intense coldness; watery/thick purulent matter that flows or drips; intensely red (applied to she-camel)
